original: Lindberg, Gunnar Ivar Bertil, överstelöjtnant, Göteborg, f. 10/4/03 i Hö-reda, Jönköp. 1., av und :löjtn. Carl L. o. Anna Hultquist. G. 43 m. Inga Elisabeth Steberg. — Off:ex., gymn:lär:-ex., KHS. Fänrik vid Kalmar rege- 5Q4mente 24, löjtnant v. Jönköping-Kalmar regemente 28, v. flygvapnet 34, kapt. 37, major 42, övilöjtn. 43. Chef f. flygavd. i försvrstaben 42-44, stabschef v. 2. flygesk. 44-45, chef f. södra flygbasomr. 45-46 o. f. västra flygbas-omr. sed. 46. Led. av 41 års försv:-iitredn. RSO, RVO.
translated: Lindberg, Gunnar Ivar Bertil, Lieutenant Colonel, Gothenburg, b. 10/4/03 in Höreda, Jönköping County, son of Lieutenant Carl L. and Anna Hultquist. Married in 1943 to Inga Elisabeth Steberg. Military education, physical education teacher certification, Military High School. Ensign in the Kalmar Regiment 24, Lieutenant in the Jönköping-Kalmar Regiment 28, transferred to the Air Force 34, Captain 37, Major 42, Lieutenant Colonel 43. Head of aviation department in the defense staff 42-44, Chief of Staff of the 2nd Flight School 44-45, Chief of the Southern Air Base Area 45-46, and the Western Air Base Area since 1946. Member of the 1941 Defense Investigation. Received the Royal Order of the Sword (RSO) and the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).

occupation.name: Chief of the Southern Air Base Area
Chief of the Western Air Base Area
